resources.string: Changes saved, you can exit now
For the app to function properly, permissions need to be granted for displaying notifications and the accessibility service.
Configure how many reels you want to receive a warning.

To accurately count the viewed reels, tiktoks, and shorts through gestures performed within the application, it is necessary to request accessibility permissions. These permissions allow the application to detect and analyze the gestures made by the user while browsing the content. No data is sent to the internet or processed outside the device. They are simply used to count and record the number of videos viewed. No information is stored or sent in any form.
